text: Anyone else have an opinion on emoji’s in the tab titles?

I’m not a beta tester so I haven’t seen the emojis but it would be cool if the extension users could modify the tab title format in some sort of settings pane…for example if i was in the design manager id like it to be : DM | Client Name here.  Sometimes the client name is too long and I can’t see The “DM” so i would opt to have that after. and i don’t need the “HS” since the sprocket favicon already tells me its HubSpot

Thank you that’s good feedback. Well good news for you - we thought the same thing about the placement of DM <https://spin.d.pr/mXfOv8+>

what you see in the screenie is what is in beta right now

Configurable titles is an interesting idea - if we go the route of being able to customize it, not sure what that’d really end up being like, a bunch of toggles or say a text field.

Either way seems like a lot of work for something I think we might be able to hit the right balance for 95% of people

I could see though possibly having a toggle for the emojis. myself I don’t know if it adds value for me more than just the text. That said I haven’t accidentally clicked the wrong tab at all since I’ve had the emojis
